dependencies.description:
Intel oneAPI Compilers. Includes: icx, icpx, ifx, and ifort. Releases
before 2024.0 include icc/icpc LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and
using this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the
software license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
dependencies.name: intel-oneapi-compilers

description:
Relies on intel-oneapi-compilers to install the compilers, and
configures modules for icc/icpc/ifort. LICENSE INFORMATION: By
downloading and using this software, you agree to the terms and
conditions of the software license agreements at
https://intel.ly/393CijO.
name: intel-oneapi-compilers-classic

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
